dcterms:description: The proposed Smart-City CCTV Violence Detection (SCVD) Dataset is focused explicitly on weaponized violence scenarios captured strictly by surveillance cameras. It contains distinctive videos of weaponized, non-weaponized, and normal violence in CCTVs, enabling AI models to learn, identify, and prioritize the degree of danger in chaotic events, particularly those involving weapons.
dcterms:title: Smart-City CCTV Violence Detection (SCVD) Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Perez
A.C. Kot
A. Rocha
dcterms:description: The NTU CCTV-Fights dataset consists of videos specifically designed for detecting real-world fights in surveillance footage.
dcterms:title: NTU CCTV-Fights

dcterms:creator: E.R. Nievas
D.S. Oscar
G.B. Gloria
R. S.
dcterms:description: The Hockey Fight dataset is designed for detecting fights specifically occurring in hockey games, providing a collection of videos for analysis.
dcterms:title: Hockey Fight

dcterms:creator: M.M. Soliman
M.H. Kamal
M.A. El-Massih Nashed
Y.M. Mostafa

D. Khattab
dcterms:description: The Real-Life Violent Situations (RLVS) dataset is used for recognizing violence from videos using deep learning techniques, providing a collection of videos for analysis.
dcterms:title: Real-Life Violent Situations (RLVS)

dcterms:creator: M. Cheng
K. Cai
M. Li
dcterms:description: RWF-2000 is an open large scale video database for violence detection, containing a variety of videos for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: RWF-2000

dcterms:description: The Sohas dataset contains images with bounding box annotations for object detection, specifically focusing on small objects handled similarly.
dcterms:title: Sohas

dcterms:creator: M.S. Nadeem
V.N. Franqueira
F. Kurugollu
X. Zhai
dcterms:description: The Weapon Violence Dataset (WVD) is a new synthetic dataset for video-based violence detection, providing a collection of synthetic videos for analysis.
dcterms:title: Weapon Violence Dataset (WVD)
